Package de.pangaea.metadataportal.config

This package provides classes and methods for panFMP's configuration (config.xml).

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Config Main panFMP configuration class.
ExpressionConfig Generic XPath/XSLT config element.
FieldConfig Config element that contains the definition of a field.
FilterConfig A filter config element that filters harvested documents by a XPath expression that returns a XPathConstants.BOOLEAN value.
IndexConfig Abstract configuration of an panFMP index.
SingleIndexConfig Configuration of a real lucene index.
VariableConfig A config element that supplies a variable like variables in XPath.
VirtualIndexConfig Configuration of a virtual lucene index.
 

Enum Summary
Config.ConfigMode  
Config.IndexDirImplementation  
FieldConfig.DataType  
FilterConfig.FilterType  
 

Package de.pangaea.metadataportal.config Description

This package provides classes and methods for panFMP's configuration (config.xml).
